title: Award Predictions with John Hollinger
description:
Zach and John Hollinger from The Athletic predict the major NBA awards and make their Finals picks for the 2022-23 season. Plus, they debate Zach's League Pass Rankings. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
